name: letterman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who has been given a letter (= a prize in the shape of the first letter of the name of a high school, college, or university, given to a student for achievement in sport, and often worn on their jacket): He was a sports letterman in high school.
More examplesFewer examplesAt Michigan, Ford was a letterman and starting center on the football team.He was a four-year letterman in basketball, football and track.During his college career, he was captain of his basketball team and was a football letterman.He went to college at UCLA, where he was a four year letterman.
